ModMetaData.name: Better Pawn Control
ModMetaData.author: VouLT
ModMetaData.description:
Bulk assignment of colonists and animals to outfits, areas, drugs, food, work in one single action. Setup different policies and switch at will.
Features: - Presets for Work, Schedule, Assign and Animal tabs - Default outfits, food, drugs when colonist or prisoners join colony - Emergency' button to toggle your configured policies at once in one click
Mod Integrations List: IMPORTANT (For RimWorld v1.3) - Combat extended - Should now work with AnimalTab and WorkTab - Children, school and learning
v2.2.4
